resources.string: Please enter a nickname\n(Only English with Number)
Accept All includes any and all consents to optional items. Therefore, even with refusal to optional items, you can use our services.

Email and personal information will be provided to offer the Lof service. For specific personal information items to be provided, please refer to the agreed contents. The information provided shall be discarded immediately when you opt out of this service.
[Required] Consent to Lof\'s provision of personal information

For user identification in Lof service, Member management and Service provision, we will provide your service User ID and personal information through Google Account (%s). The information provided shall be discarded immediately when you opt out of this service. You have the right to refuse the consent below and the use of the service will be restricted should you choose to refuse.
For user identification in LoF Service, Member management and Service provision
Destroy without delay when you opt out of this service
